title: Interactive Map
content:
rything a D&D aficionado has ever dreamt of. Players will get a full, complete view of every accessible area of the whole playable world in BG3. From dark dungeons filled with monsters and secrets, to wide open cities, bustling with NPCs, Merchants, and Quests

Players can get ready to submerge in the world of Faerun and spend countless hours diving into its secrets, mesmerizing with the scope of a magical world. Everything about Baldur's Gate 3 interactive map: all the regions, points of intere
